page.title: 07Cornish Customs
page.content: The Padstow Hobby Hoss festival takes place in Padstow, a little port in Cornwall.A man dresses up in black and has a hoop fastened around him.Black material is fixed over this and it hangs down to the ground.He wears a big black cloak and dances around the town.It gets very tiring so when he has had enough he swaps with another man who will dance until he gets too tired and then swap with someone else.People come from all over Cornwall to watch this.The dancing starts at dawn and finishes at dusk.
